Né au départ d'un simple mod développé pour Half-Life, Counter-Strike a pu, en seulement quelques années devenir la référence du FPS en ligne sur PC. Vu le succès grandissant de la série, c'est en octobre 2004 que Valve se décide à sortir cette édition « Source » qui profite donc du moteur 3D éponyme utilisé à la base pour le jeu Half-Life 2.
Reprenant à merveille les bases du premier Counter-Strike, cette version Source se contente d'améliorer ce qui était déjà bon et le fait très bien.
Le gameplay est plus rapide que le Counter-Strike Classic.
The absolute, #1 FPS on the internet, in my opinion. I'm speaking of the franchise, by the way, obviously Global Offensive is a fresh and updated version.

Римейк классической игры 1999 года Counter-Strike. Вы мечтали когда нибудь поиграть в Counter-Strike на движке Source Engine? Пожалуйста! Просто купите диск, или же приобретите цифровую версию в Steam Store. И насладитесь, римейком Counter-Strike.

CSS was my first FPS on the steam platform.

Due to my hardware limitations, I cannot run the game at good settings.

Many things make CSS a great game. Plenty of maps and tons of active players. Bunches of communities ensure that the gaming dynamic is always changing.

In my honest opinion, I think Counter Strike Source is still the king of the Counter Strike games, Counter Strike 1.6 is the Old timer, Counter Strike: Global offensive is the new kid on the block who needs to learn. CS:GO might be newer, but to me, poor accuracy, teamwork, cluttered UI and some pay to play features.. I expect something I purchase to be free across all features.

Like Real Life. But there is a Respawn.

Score - 7/10

When you use a flashbang on someone else, it lasts four seconds.
When someone uses one against you, it lasts ten seconds.
When you try to get a headshot on someone else, the hitbox is the size of your dick.
When someone else tries to headshot you, the hitbox is larger than the ego of Markus 'Notch' Perrson.
When you join the Counter-Terrorists, the Terrorists win.
When you join the Terrorists, the Counter-Terrorists win.
When you have the bomb, you die.
When someone else has the bomb, they are God.
Verdict: The game hates you. Buy this game.
